======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------

       projMatrix, offset=128, size=1, type=GL_FLOAT_MAT4, val=[0.903349, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.732051, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, -1.002002, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, -0.200200, 0.000000]
       modelviewMatrix, offset=192, size=1, type=GL_FLOAT_MAT4, val=[1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, -3.000000, 1.000000]
       modelviewprojMatrix, offset=256, size=1, type=GL_FLOAT_MAT4, val=[0.903349, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.732051, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, -1.002002, -1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 2.805806, 3.000000]

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------
GL_ATTACHED_SHADERS: 2
GL_ACTIVE_ATTRIBUTES: 2
  [0]: normal, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC3
  [1]: position, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC4
GL_ACTIVE_UNIFORMS: 64
GL_ACTIVE_UNIFORM_BLOCKS: 3
  [0]: GLMatrices
     GL_UNIFORM_BLOCK_BINDING: 0
     GL_UNIFORM_BLOCK_DATA_SIZE: 368
     Members:
       modelMatrix, offset=0, size=1, type=GL_FLOAT_MAT4, val=[1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000]
       viewMatrix, offset=64, size=1, type=GL_FLOAT_MAT4, val=[0.999147, 0.000758, -0.041288, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.999831, 0.018357, 0.000000, 0.041295, -0.018342, 0.998979, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, -3.000000, 1.000000]

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------
GL_ATTACHED_SHADERS: 2
GL_ACTIVE_ATTRIBUTES: 2
  [0]: normal, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC3

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------
GL_ATTACHED_SHADERS: 2

======================================================================
Id de programa: 18  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: 
---------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  3 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  4 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  8 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
  9 |};
 10 |in vec4 position;
 11 |in vec2 texCoord;
 12 |out vec2 texCoordFrag;
 13 |void main() {
 14 |  texCoordFrag = texCoord;
 15 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 16 |}
Fragment shader: 
-----------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |uniform sampler2D texUnit;
  3 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |void main() {
  6 |  fragColor = texture(texUnit, texCoordFrag);
  7 |}
----------------------------------------------------------------------
GL_ATTACHED_SHADERS: 2

  [0]: position, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC4
  [1]: texCoord, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC2

  Default Uniform Block members:
       texUnit, size=1, type=GL_SAMPLER_2D, loc: 0, val: [0]
GL_ACTIVE_UNIFORM_BLOCKS: 1
  [0]: GLMatrices
     GL_UNIFORM_BLOCK_BINDING: 0

Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag

  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |

  9 |}
 10 |

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------

  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------

BOUND SHADER STORAGE BUFFERS

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------
GL_ATTACHED_SHADERS: 2
GL_ACTIVE_ATTRIBUTES: 2
  [0]: normal, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC3
  [1]: position, size= 1, type= GL_FLOAT_VEC4
GL_ACTIVE_UNIFORMS: 64
GL_ACTIVE_UNIFORM_BLOCKS: 3
  [0]: GLMatrices
     GL_UNIFORM_BLOCK_BINDING: 0

BOUND SHADER STORAGE BUFFERS

======================================================================
Id de programa: 3  GL_DELETE_STATUS: GL_FALSE  GL_LINK_STATUS: GL_TRUE  GL_VALIDATE_STATUS: GL_TRUE
Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 57 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 58 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 59 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 60 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 61 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 62 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 63 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 64 |    }
 65 |
 66 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 67 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 68 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 69 |  }
 70 |
 71 |  return color;
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |void main() {
 75 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 76 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 77 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 78 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 79 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 80 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 81 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 82 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 color;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |
  6 |
  7 |void main() {
  8 |  fragColor = color;
  9 |}
 10 |
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  2 |uniform sampler2D texUnit;
  3 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
  4 |out vec4 fragColor;
  5 |void main() {
  6 |  fragColor = texture(texUnit, texCoordFrag);
  7 |}

[Thu Apr  2 00:12:12 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(58) : error C1008: undefined variable "attenuation"
0(58) : error C1008: undefined variable "attenuation"
0(58) : error C1008: undefined variable "attenuation"

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code. You hear? MY
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, attenuation.x + attenuation.y * d + attenuation.z * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(L_nagative * spotDirectionEye, 0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code. You hear? MY
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource->attenuation.x + LightSource->attenuation.y * d + LightSource->attenuation.z * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(L_nagative * spotDirectionEye, 0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa

 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }

 78 |  }

 81 |}

[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 22 ha reservado 368 bytes
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [glMatrices.cpp (160)] UBO GLMatrices creado
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 23 ha reservado 576 bytes
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [uboLightSources.cpp (86)] UBO LightSources creado
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 24 ha reservado 80 bytes
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Thu Apr  2 00:15:55 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(58) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '.', expecting '(' at token "."

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code. You hear? MY
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation.x + LightSource.attenuation.y * d + LightSource.attenuation.z * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(L_nagative * spotDirectionEye, 0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

 56 |    //My code. You hear? MY

 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation[0] + LightSource.attenuation[1] * d + LightSource.attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );

[Thu Apr  2 00:32:24 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(58) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '.', expecting '(' at token "."

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation.at(0) + LightSource.attenuation.at(1) * d + LightSource.attenuation.at(2) * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, spotDirectionEye), 0.0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    //float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation.at(0) + LightSource.attenuation.at(1) * d + LightSource.attenuation.at(2) * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, spotDirectionEye), 0.0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    //float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation.at(0) + LightSource.attenuation.at(1) * d + LightSource.attenuation.at(2) * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, LightSource.spotDirectionEye), 0.0), spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, LightSource.attenuation.at(0) + LightSource.attenuation.at(1) * d + LightSource.attenuation.at(2) * pow(d,2) );

 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }

 71 |    //ambient - directional

 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +

 78 |  }

 80 |  return color;

[Thu Apr  2 00:37:20 2020] INF: [uboLightSources.cpp (86)] UBO LightSources creado
[Thu Apr  2 00:37:20 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 24 ha reservado 80 bytes
[Thu Apr  2 00:37:20 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Thu Apr  2 00:37:20 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Thu Apr  2 00:37:20 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(58) : error C1031: swizzle mask element not present in operand "at"
0(58) : error C1105: cannot call a non-function
0(58) : error C1031: swizzle mask element not present in operand "at"
0(58) : error C1105: cannot call a non-function

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation.at(0) + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation.at(2) * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 61 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 62 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 63 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 64 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 65 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 66 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 67 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 68 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 69 |    }
 70 |
 71 |    //ambient - directional
 72 |    //diffuse - point
 73 |    //specular - focal
 74 |
 75 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main() {
 84 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 85 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 86 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 88 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 89 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 90 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 91 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 92 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 93 |}
 94 |

[Thu Apr  2 01:27:33 2020] INF: [uboLightSources.cpp (86)] UBO LightSources creado
[Thu Apr  2 01:27:33 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 24 ha reservado 80 bytes
[Thu Apr  2 01:27:33 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Thu Apr  2 01:27:33 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Thu Apr  2 01:27:33 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(65) : error C1008: undefined variable "spotCosCutoff"

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 56 |    //My code
 57 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |    float aten = 1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 59 |    vec3 L_nagative = - L;
 60 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 61 |    float foco = 1.0;
 62 |    if (lights[i].directional==1 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 65 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 66 |    }
 67 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 68 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 69 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 70 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 71 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 72 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 73 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 74 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 75 |    }
 76 |
 77 |    //ambient - directional
 78 |    //diffuse - point
 79 |    //specular - focal
 80 |
 81 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 82 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 83 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 84 |  }
 85 |
 86 |  return color;
 87 |}
 88 |
 89 |void main() {
 90 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 91 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 92 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 93 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 94 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 95 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 96 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 97 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 98 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 99 |}
100 |

[Sun Apr  5 12:05:03 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(65) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '}', expecting ',' or ';' at token "}"
0(69) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '}', expecting ',' or ';' at token "}"

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |out vec3 pView;
 48 |
 49 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 50 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 51 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 52 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 53 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 54 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 55 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |      continue;
 57 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 58 |    //if directional check
 59 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 60 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 61 |    vec3 L;
 62 |    if (directCheck==0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos)
 65 |    }
 66 |    else
 67 |    {
 68 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].spotDirectionEye))
 69 |    }
 70 |    //My code
 71 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 72 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 73 |    float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 74 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 75 |    //aten = 1;
 76 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 77 |    float foco = 1.0;
 78 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 79 |    {
 80 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 81 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 82 |    }
 83 |    //end of my code
 84 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 85 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 86 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 87 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 88 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 89 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 90 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 91 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 92 |    }
 93 |
 94 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 95 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 96 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 97 |  }
 98 |
 99 |  return color;
100 |}
101 |
102 |void main() {
103 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
104 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
105 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
106 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
107 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
108 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
109 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
110 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
111 |  pNormal = eN;
112 |  pView = V;
113 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
114 |}
115 |

[Sun Apr  5 12:24:35 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(61) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting ')' at token "("

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |//out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |//out vec3 pView;
 48 |
 49 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 50 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 51 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 52 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 53 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 54 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 55 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |      continue;
 57 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 58 |    //if directional check
 59 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 60 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 61 |    vec3 Lnormalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 62 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        L = normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 65 |    }
 66 |    //My code
 67 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 68 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 69 |    //check directional
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        aten = 1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
102 |
103 |void main() {
104 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
105 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
106 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
108 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
109 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
110 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
111 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
112 |  //pNormal = eN;
113 |  //pView = V;
114 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
115 |}
116 |

 32 |};

 62 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        L = normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 65 |    }
 66 |    //My code
 67 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 68 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 69 |    //check directional
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        //aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
