 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |//out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |//out vec3 pView;
 48 |
 49 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 50 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 51 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 52 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 53 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 54 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 55 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |      continue;
 57 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 58 |    //if directional check
 59 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 60 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 61 |    vec3 Lnormalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 62 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        L = normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 65 |    }
 66 |    //My code
 67 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 68 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 69 |    //check directional
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    //if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        //aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
102 |
103 |void main() {
104 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
105 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
106 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
108 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
109 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
110 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
111 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
112 |  //pNormal = eN;
113 |  //pView = V;
114 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
115 |}
116 |

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |out vec3 pView;
 48 |out vec4 pPos;
 49 |out vec3 pLight[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 52 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 53 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 54 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 55 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 56 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 57 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 58 |      continue;
 59 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 60 |    //if directional check
 61 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 62 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 63 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 64 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 65 |    {
 66 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 67 |    }
 68 |    //My code
 69 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 70 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 71 |    //check directional
 72 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 73 |    float aten = 1;
 74 |    if (directCheck==0)
 75 |    {
 76 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 77 |    }
 78 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 79 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 80 |    float foco = 1.0;
 81 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 82 |    {
 83 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 84 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 85 |    }
 86 |    //end of my code
 87 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 88 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 89 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 90 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 91 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 92 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 93 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 94 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 95 |    }
 96 |
 97 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 98 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 99 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
100 |  }
101 |
102 |  return color;
103 |}
104 |
105 |void main() {
106 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
108 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
109 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
110 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
111 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
112 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
113 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
114 |  pNormal = eN;
115 |  pView = V;
116 |  pPos = eposition;
117 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
118 |  {
119 |    pLight[i] = vec3(modelviewMatrix * lights[i].positionEye);
120 |  }
121 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
122 |}
123 |

  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;

 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;

 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};

 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |

 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |

 47 |out vec3 pView;
 48 |out vec4 pPos;
 49 |out vec3 pLight[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 52 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 53 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 54 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 55 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 56 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 57 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 58 |      continue;
 59 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 60 |    //if directional check
 61 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 62 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 63 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 64 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 65 |    {
 66 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 67 |    }
 68 |    //My code
 69 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 70 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 71 |    //check directional
 72 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 73 |    float aten = 1;
 74 |    if (directCheck==0)
 75 |    {
 76 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 77 |    }
 78 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 79 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 80 |    float foco = 1.0;
 81 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 82 |    {
 83 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 84 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 85 |    }
 86 |    //end of my code
 87 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 88 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 89 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 90 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 91 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 92 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 93 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 94 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 95 |    }
 96 |
 97 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 98 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 99 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
100 |  }
101 |
102 |  return color;
103 |}

 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }

105 |void main() {
106 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
108 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
109 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
110 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
111 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
112 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
113 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
114 |  pNormal = eN;
115 |  pView = V;
116 |  pPos = eposition;
117 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
118 |  {
119 |    pLight[i] = vec3(modelviewMatrix * lights[i].positionEye);
120 |  }
121 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
122 |}
123 |

[Sun Apr  5 18:04:35 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Sun Apr  5 18:04:35 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(116) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |out vec3 pView;
 48 |out vec4 pPos;
 49 |out vec3 pLight[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 52 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 53 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 54 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 55 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 56 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 57 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 58 |      continue;
 59 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 60 |    //if directional check
 61 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 62 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 63 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 64 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 65 |    {
 66 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 67 |    }
 68 |    //My code
 69 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 70 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 71 |    //check directional
 72 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 73 |    float aten = 1;
 74 |    if (directCheck==0)
 75 |    {
 76 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 77 |    }
 78 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 79 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 80 |    float foco = 1.0;
 81 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 82 |    {
 83 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 84 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 85 |    }
 86 |    //end of my code
 87 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 88 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 89 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 90 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 91 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 92 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 93 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 94 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 95 |    }
 96 |
 97 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 98 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 99 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
100 |  }
101 |
102 |  return color;
103 |}
104 |
105 |void main() {
106 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
108 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
109 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
110 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
111 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
112 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
113 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
114 |  pNormal = eN;
115 |  pView = V;
116 |  pPos = eposition;
117 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
118 |  {
119 |    pLight[i] = vec3(modelviewMatrix * lights[i].positionEye);
120 |  }
121 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
122 |}
123 |

  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform float phongFlag;
 42 |
 43 |in vec4 color;
 44 |
 45 |in vec3 pNormal;
 46 |in vec3 pView;
 47 |in vec3 pPos;
 48 |in vec3 pLight[lights.length()];
 49 |
 50 |out vec4 fragColor;
 51 |
 52 |void main()
 53 |{
 54 |    bool flag = true//bool(phongFlag);
 55 |    if (flag)
 56 |    {
 57 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (vec3(pNormal));
 58 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (vec3(pView));
 59 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (vec3(pPos));
 60 |    }
 61 |    fragColor = color;
 62 |}

------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 pNormal;
 47 |out vec3 pView;
 48 |out vec3 pPos;
 49 |out vec3 pLight[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 52 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 53 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 54 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 55 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 56 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 57 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 58 |      continue;
 59 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 60 |    //if directional check
 61 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 62 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 63 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 64 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 65 |    {
 66 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 67 |    }
 68 |    pL[i] = L;
 69 |    //My code
 70 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 71 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 72 |    //check directional
 73 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 74 |    float aten = 1;
 75 |    if (directCheck==0)
 76 |    {
 77 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 78 |    }
 79 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 80 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 81 |    float foco = 1.0;
 82 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 83 |    {
 84 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 85 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 86 |    }
 87 |    //end of my code
 88 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 89 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 90 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 91 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 92 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 93 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 94 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 95 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 96 |    }
 97 |
 98 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 99 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
100 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
101 |  }
102 |
103 |  return color;
104 |}
105 |
106 |void main() {
107 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
108 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
109 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
110 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
111 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
112 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
113 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
114 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
115 |  pNormal = eN;
116 |  pView = V;
117 |  pPos = eposition;
118 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
119 |  {
120 |    //pL[i] = vec3(modelviewMatrix * lights[i].positionEye);
121 |  }
122 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
123 |}
124 |

[Sun Apr  5 20:27:37 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Sun Apr  5 20:27:37 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Sun Apr  5 20:27:37 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
[Sun Apr  5 20:27:37 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(22) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '}', expecting ',' or ';' at token "}"

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  4 |{
  5 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  6 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  7 |mat4 projMatrix;
  8 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 10 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 11 |};
 12 |
 13 |struct LightSource {
 14 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 15 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 16 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 17 |int directional;
 18 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 19 |int enabled;
 20 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 21 |vec3 attenuation
 22 |};
 23 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 24 |{
 25 |LightSource lights[4];
 26 |};
 27 |
 28 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 29 |{
 30 |vec4 diffuse;
 31 |vec4 ambient;
 32 |vec4 specular;
 33 |vec4 emissive;
 34 |float shininess;
 35 |int textureCount;
 36 |};
 37 |
 38 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 39 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 40 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 41 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 42 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 43 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 44 |
 45 |//uniform float phongFlag;
 46 |
 47 |in vec4 color;
 48 |
 49 |in vec3 pNormal;
 50 |in vec3 pView;
 51 |in vec3 pPos;
 52 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 53 |
 54 |out vec4 fragColor;
 55 |
 56 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 57 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 58 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 59 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 60 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 61 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 62 |      continue;
 63 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 64 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(pL[i]));
 65 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 66 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 67 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 68 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 69 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 70 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 71 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 72 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 73 |    }
 74 |
 75 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 76 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 77 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 78 |  }
 79 |
 80 |  return color;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main()
 84 |{
 85 |    fragColor = color;
 86 |    bool flag = true;
 87 |    //bool(phongFlag);
 88 |    if (flag)
 89 |    {
 90 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (vec3(pNormal));
 91 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (vec3(pView));
 92 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (vec3(pPos));
 93 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
 94 |    }
 95 |}
 96 |

  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  4 |{
  5 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  6 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  7 |mat4 projMatrix;
  8 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 10 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 11 |};
 12 |

 14 |{
 15 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 16 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 17 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 18 |int directional;
 19 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 20 |int enabled;
 21 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 22 |vec3 attenuation
 23 |}
 24 |
 25 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 26 |{
 27 |LightSource lights[4];
 28 |};
 29 |
 30 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 31 |{
 32 |vec4 diffuse;
 33 |vec4 ambient;
 34 |vec4 specular;
 35 |vec4 emissive;
 36 |float shininess;
 37 |int textureCount;
 38 |};
 39 |
 40 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 41 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 42 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 43 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 44 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 45 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 46 |
 47 |//uniform float phongFlag;
 48 |
 49 |in vec4 color;
 50 |
 51 |in vec3 pNormal;
 52 |in vec3 pView;
 53 |in vec3 pPos;
 54 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 55 |
 56 |out vec4 fragColor;
 57 |
 58 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 59 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 60 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 61 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 62 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 63 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 64 |      continue;
 65 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 66 |    vec3 L = normalize(vec3(pL[i]));
 67 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 68 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 69 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 70 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 71 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 72 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 73 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 74 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 75 |    }
 76 |
 77 |    color += lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 78 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 79 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult;
 80 |  }
 81 |
 82 |  return color;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |void main()
 86 |{
 87 |    fragColor = color;
 88 |    bool flag = true;
 89 |    //bool(phongFlag);
 90 |    if (flag)
 91 |    {
 92 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (vec3(pNormal));
 93 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (vec3(pView));
 94 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (vec3(pPos));
 95 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
 96 |    }
 97 |}
 98 |

[Sun Apr  5 23:41:04 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Sun Apr  5 23:41:04 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
[Sun Apr  5 23:41:04 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(47) : error C7548: 'layout(location)' requires "#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : enable" before use
0(47) : error C0000: ... or #version 430

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  4 |{
  5 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  6 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  7 |mat4 projMatrix;
  8 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 10 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 11 |};
 12 |
 13 |struct LightSource
 14 |{
 15 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 16 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 17 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 18 |int directional;
 19 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 20 |int enabled;
 21 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 22 |vec3 attenuation;
 23 |};
 24 |
 25 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 26 |{
 27 |LightSource lights[4];
 28 |};
 29 |
 30 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 31 |{
 32 |vec4 diffuse;
 33 |vec4 ambient;
 34 |vec4 specular;
 35 |vec4 emissive;
 36 |float shininess;
 37 |int textureCount;
 38 |};
 39 |
 40 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 41 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 42 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 43 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 44 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 45 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 46 |
 47 |layout (location = 290) uniform float phongFlag;
 48 |
 49 |in vec4 color;
 50 |
 51 |in vec3 pNormal;
 52 |in vec3 pView;
 53 |in vec3 pPos;
 54 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 55 |
 56 |out vec4 fragColor;
 57 |
 58 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 59 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 60 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 61 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 62 |  {
 63 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 64 |      continue;
 65 |    vec3 L = pL[i];
 66 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 67 |    float d = distance (pL[i], pos);
 68 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 69 |    float aten = 1;
 70 |    if (directCheck==0)
 71 |    {
 72 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 73 |    }
 74 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 75 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 76 |    float foco = 1.0;
 77 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 78 |    {
 79 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 80 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 81 |    }
 82 |    //end of my code
 83 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 84 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 85 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 86 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 87 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 88 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 89 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 90 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 91 |    }
 92 |
 93 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 94 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 95 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 96 |  }
 97 |
 98 |  return color;
 99 |}
100 |
101 |void main()
102 |{
103 |    fragColor = color;
104 |    bool flag = true;
105 |    //bool(phongFlag);
106 |    if (flag)
107 |    {
108 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (pNormal);
109 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (pView);
110 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (pPos);
111 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
112 |    }
113 |}
114 |

[Sun Apr  5 23:47:07 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(48) : error C7548: 'layout(location)' requires "#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : enable" before use
0(48) : error C0000: ... or #version 430

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |//#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : require
  3 |
  4 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  5 |{
  6 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  7 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  8 |mat4 projMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
 10 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 11 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 12 |};
 13 |
 14 |struct LightSource
 15 |{
 16 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 17 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 18 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 19 |int directional;
 20 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 21 |int enabled;
 22 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 23 |vec3 attenuation;
 24 |};
 25 |
 26 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 27 |{
 28 |LightSource lights[4];
 29 |};
 30 |
 31 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 32 |{
 33 |vec4 diffuse;
 34 |vec4 ambient;
 35 |vec4 specular;
 36 |vec4 emissive;
 37 |float shininess;
 38 |int textureCount;
 39 |};
 40 |
 41 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 42 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 43 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 44 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 45 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 46 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 47 |
 48 |layout (location = 290) uniform float phongFlag;
 49 |
 50 |in vec4 color;
 51 |
 52 |in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |in vec3 pView;
 54 |in vec3 pPos;
 55 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |out vec4 fragColor;
 58 |
 59 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 60 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 61 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 62 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 63 |  {
 64 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 65 |      continue;
 66 |    vec3 L = pL[i];
 67 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 68 |    float d = distance (pL[i], pos);
 69 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 70 |    float aten = 1;
 71 |    if (directCheck==0)
 72 |    {
 73 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 74 |    }
 75 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 76 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 77 |    float foco = 1.0;
 78 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 79 |    {
 80 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 81 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 82 |    }
 83 |    //end of my code
 84 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 85 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 86 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 87 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 88 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 89 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 90 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 91 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 92 |    }
 93 |
 94 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 95 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 96 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 97 |  }
 98 |
 99 |  return color;
100 |}
101 |
102 |void main()
103 |{
104 |    fragColor = color;
105 |    bool flag = true;
106 |    //bool(phongFlag);
107 |    if (flag)
108 |    {
109 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (pNormal);
110 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (pView);
111 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (pPos);
112 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
113 |    }
114 |}
115 |

[Mon Apr  6 01:15:52 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 24 ha reservado 80 bytes
[Mon Apr  6 01:15:52 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Mon Apr  6 01:15:52 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Mon Apr  6 01:15:52 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(64) : error C1008: undefined variable "foco"
0(64) : error C1008: undefined variable "foco"

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].positionEye.xyz - pos);
 56 |	// Calculo factor de atenuacion
 57 |	float dist = distance(vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 58 |	float fAten = 1 / max(1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * dist + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(dist, 2));
 59 |	// Calculo del efecto foco
 60 |	float efFoco = 1.0;
 61 |	if (lights[i].directional == 0.0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 62 |	{
 63 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-L, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 64 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 65 |	}
 66 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 67 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 68 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 69 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 70 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 71 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 72 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 73 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 74 |    }
 75 |
 76 |    color += fAten * efFoco *
 77 |			 (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 78 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 79 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 80 |  }
 81 |
 82 |  return color;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |void main() {
 86 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
 87 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 88 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
 89 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 90 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
 91 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 92 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
 93 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
 94 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 95 |}
 96 |

[Mon Apr  6 02:08:39 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 24 ha reservado 80 bytes
[Mon Apr  6 02:08:39 2020] INF: [uboMaterial.cpp (54)] UBO Material creado
[Mon Apr  6 02:08:39 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Mon Apr  6 02:08:39 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
[Mon Apr  6 02:08:39 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(48) : error C7548: 'layout(location)' requires "#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : enable" before use
0(48) : error C0000: ... or #version 430

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.frag
--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |//#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : enable
  3 |
  4 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  5 |{
  6 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  7 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  8 |mat4 projMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
 10 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 11 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 12 |};
 13 |
 14 |struct LightSource
 15 |{
 16 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 17 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 18 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 19 |int directional;
 20 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 21 |int enabled;
 22 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 23 |vec3 attenuation;
 24 |};
 25 |
 26 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 27 |{
 28 |LightSource lights[4];
 29 |};
 30 |
 31 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 32 |{
 33 |vec4 diffuse;
 34 |vec4 ambient;
 35 |vec4 specular;
 36 |vec4 emissive;
 37 |float shininess;
 38 |int textureCount;
 39 |};
 40 |
 41 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 42 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 43 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 44 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 45 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 46 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 47 |
 48 |layout (location = 19) uniform float phongFlag;
 49 |//uniform float phongFlag;
 50 |
 51 |in vec4 color;
 52 |
 53 |in vec3 pNormal;
 54 |in vec3 pView;
 55 |in vec3 pPos;
 56 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 57 |
 58 |out vec4 fragColor;
 59 |
 60 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 61 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 62 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 63 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 64 |  {
 65 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 66 |      continue;
 67 |    vec3 L = pL[i];
 68 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 69 |    float d = distance (pL[i], pos);
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
102 |
103 |void main()
104 |{
105 |    fragColor = color;
106 |    bool flag = true;
107 |    //bool(phongFlag);
108 |    if (flag)
109 |    {
110 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (pNormal);
111 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (pView);
112 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (pPos);
113 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
114 |    }
115 |}
116 |

--------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420
  2 |//#extension GL_ARB_explicit_uniform_location : enable
  3 |
  4 |layout (std140) uniform GLMatrices
  5 |{
  6 |mat4 modelMatrix;
  7 |mat4 viewMatrix;
  8 |mat4 projMatrix;
  9 |mat4 modelviewMatrix;
 10 |mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
 11 |mat3 normalMatrix;
 12 |};
 13 |
 14 |struct LightSource
 15 |{
 16 |vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 17 |vec4 positionWorld, positionEye;
 18 |vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 19 |int directional;
 20 |vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 21 |int enabled;
 22 |float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 23 |vec3 attenuation;
 24 |};
 25 |
 26 |layout (std140) uniform Lights
 27 |{
 28 |LightSource lights[4];
 29 |};
 30 |
 31 |layout (std140) uniform Material
 32 |{
 33 |vec4 diffuse;
 34 |vec4 ambient;
 35 |vec4 specular;
 36 |vec4 emissive;
 37 |float shininess;
 38 |int textureCount;
 39 |};
 40 |
 41 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 42 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 43 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 44 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 45 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 46 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 47 |
 48 |layout (location = 19) uniform float phongFlag;
 49 |//uniform float phongFlag;
 50 |
 51 |in vec4 color;
 52 |
 53 |in vec3 pNormal;
 54 |in vec3 pView;
 55 |in vec3 pPos;
 56 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 57 |
 58 |out vec4 fragColor;
 59 |
 60 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 61 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 62 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 63 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 64 |  {
 65 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 66 |      continue;
 67 |    vec3 L = pL[i];
 68 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 69 |    float d = distance (pL[i], pos);
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
102 |
103 |void main()
104 |{
105 |    fragColor = color;
106 |    bool flag = bool(phongFlag);
107 |    if (flag)
108 |    {
109 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (pNormal);
110 |        vec3 phongView = normalize (pView);
111 |        vec3 phongPos = normalize (pPos);
112 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
113 |    }
114 |}
115 |

[Thu Apr 16 20:07:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
[Thu Apr 16 20:07:44 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(64) : error C1008: undefined variable "L"
0(76) : error C1008: undefined variable "L"
0(86) : error C1008: undefined variable "L"
0(90) : error C1008: undefined variable "L"

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/gouraud.vert
------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |// Suponiendo fuentes puntuales
 47 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 48 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 49 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 50 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) {
 51 |    // Si la fuente est· apagada, no tenerla en cuenta
 52 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 53 |      continue;
 54 |    // Vector iluminaciÛn (desde vÈrtice a la fuente)
 55 |    //if directional check
 56 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 57 |    //vec3 L = directCheck==0?normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos):normalize(vec3(-lights[i].spotDirectionEye));
 58 |    if (directCheck==0)
 59 |        {
 60 |            vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 61 |        }
 62 |    if (directCheck!=0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 65 |    }
 66 |    //My code
 67 |    float d = distance (vec3(lights[i].positionEye), pos);
 68 |    //float d = length (vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 69 |    //check directional
 70 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 71 |    float aten = 1;
 72 |    if (directCheck==0)
 73 |    {
 74 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 75 |    }
 76 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 77 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 78 |    float foco = 1.0;
 79 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 80 |    {
 81 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 82 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 83 |    }
 84 |    //end of my code
 85 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 86 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 87 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 88 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 89 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 90 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 91 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 92 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 93 |    }
 94 |
 95 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 96 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 97 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 98 |  }
 99 |
100 |  return color;
101 |}
102 |
103 |void main() {
104 |  // Normal en el espacio de la c·mara
105 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
106 |  // VÈrtice en el espacio de la c·mara
107 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
108 |  // Vector vista (desde vÈrtice a la c·mara)
109 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
110 |  // C·lculo de la iluminaciÛn
111 |  color = iluminacion(eposition, eN, V);
112 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
113 |}
114 |

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |//out vec3 tangent[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 53 |{
 54 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 55 |    {
 56 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 57 |            continue;
 58 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 59 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 60 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 61 |        {
 62 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 63 |        }
 64 |    fL[i] = L;
 65 |    fH[i] = L+pos;
 66 |    }
 67 |}
 68 |
 69 |void main() {
 70 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 71 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 72 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 73 |  lightStore(eposition);
 74 |  //tanStore();
 75 |  fN = eN;
 76 |  fE = V;
 77 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 78 |}
 79 |
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 color;
 42 |
 43 |in vec3 pNormal;
 44 |in vec3 pView;
 45 |in vec3 pPos;
 46 |in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 47 |
 48 |out vec4 fragColor;
 49 |
 50 |vec4 iluminacion(vec3 pos, vec3 N, vec3 V) {
 51 |  // Componente emisiva del material
 52 |  vec4 color = emissive;
 53 |  for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 54 |  {
 55 |    if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |      continue;
 57 |    vec3 L = normalize(pL[i]);
 58 |    int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 59 |    float d = distance (L, pos);
 60 |    //float aten = directCheck!=0?1:1 / max (1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 61 |    float aten = 1;
 62 |    if (directCheck==0)
 63 |    {
 64 |        aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
 65 |    }
 66 |    vec3 L_nagative = L*(-1.0f);
 67 |    //float foco = pow(max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0), lights[i].spotExponent);
 68 |    float foco = 1.0;
 69 |    if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
 70 |    {
 71 |        float maxCosAngle = max(dot(L_nagative, lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
 72 |        foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
 73 |    }
 74 |    //end of my code
 75 |    // Multiplicador de la componente difusa
 76 |    float diffuseMult = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
 77 |    float specularMult = 0.0;
 78 |    if (diffuseMult > 0.0) {
 79 |      // Multiplicador de la componente especular
 80 |      vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
 81 |      specularMult = max(0.0, dot(R, V));
 82 |      specularMult = pow(specularMult, shininess);
 83 |    }
 84 |
 85 |    color += aten * foco * (lights[i].ambient * ambient +
 86 |             lights[i].diffuse * diffuse * diffuseMult +
 87 |             lights[i].specular * specular * specularMult);
 88 |  }
 89 |
 90 |  return color;
 91 |}
 92 |
 93 |void main()
 94 |{
 95 |        vec3 phongNormal = normalize (pNormal);
 96 |        vec3 phongView = (pView);
 97 |        vec3 phongPos =  (pPos);
 98 |        fragColor = iluminacion(phongPos, phongNormal, phongView);
 99 |}
100 |

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 52 |{
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |    fL[i] = L;
 64 |    pL[i] = L;
 65 |    fH[i] = L - pos;
 66 |    }
 67 |}
 68 |
 69 |void main() {
 70 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 71 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 72 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 73 |  //lightStore(eposition);
 74 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 75 |    {
 76 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 77 |            continue;
 78 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 79 |        fL[i] = L;
 80 |        fH[i] = normalize(L + pos);
 81 |    }
 82 |  fN = eN;
 83 |  fE = V;
 84 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 85 |}
 86 |

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 52 |{
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |    fL[i] = L;
 64 |    fH[i] = L - pos;
 65 |    }
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |void main() {
 69 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 70 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 71 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 72 |  //lightStore(eposition);
 73 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 74 |    {
 75 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 76 |            continue;
 77 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 78 |        fL[i] = L;
 79 |        fH[i] = normalize(L + pos);
 80 |    }
 81 |  fN = eN;
 82 |  fE = V;
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}
 85 |

  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |//out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |//out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |//out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 52 |{
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |    fL[i] = L;
 64 |    fH[i] = L - pos;
 65 |    }
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |void main() {
 69 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 70 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 71 |  //vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 72 |  //lightStore(eposition);
 73 |  /*
 74 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)

 79 |        fL[i] = L;
 80 |        fH[i] = normalize(L + V);
 81 |    }
 82 |    */
 83 |  fN = eN;
 84 |  fE = eposition;
 85 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 86 |}

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |//out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |//out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |//out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |
 51 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 52 |{
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |    fL[i] = L;
 64 |    fH[i] = L - pos;
 65 |    }
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |void main() {
 69 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 70 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 71 |  //vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 72 |  //lightStore(eposition);
 73 |  /*
 74 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 75 |    {
 76 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 77 |            continue;
 78 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) -eposition.xyz);
 79 |        fL[i] = L;
 80 |        fH[i] = normalize(L + V);
 81 |    }
 82 |    */
 83 |  fN = eN;
 84 |  fE = eposition;
 85 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 86 |}
 87 |

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.71.8282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        /*
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
101 |            float D = Beckmann (H,N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
102 |            float G = Gatten(L,E,H,N) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
103 |            float CT = F*D*G;
104 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L))*lights[i].diffuse;
105 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
106 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
107 |        }
108 |        fragColor=color;
109 |        */
110 |        fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
111 |}
