 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.71.8282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        /*
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
101 |            float D = Beckmann (H,N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
102 |            float G = Gatten(L,E,H,N) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
103 |            float CT = F*D*G;
104 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L))*lights[i].diffuse;
105 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
106 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
107 |        }
108 |        fragColor=color;
109 |        */
110 |        fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
111 |}

[Tue Apr 21 16:42:30 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(101) : error C1020: invalid operands to "+"

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H,N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L,E,H,N) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H,N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L,E,H,N) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H,N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L,E,H,N) / max (0.001f, dot(L,N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }

113 |}

[Tue Apr 21 16:45:16 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/cook.frag
[Tue Apr 21 16:45:16 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(102) : error C1008: undefined variable "one_over_p"

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_p*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |//out vec4 color;
 45 |
 46 |out vec3 fN;
 47 |//out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fE;
 49 |//out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |/*
 51 |void lightStore(vec3 pos)
 52 |{
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) - pos);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |    fL[i] = L;
 64 |    fH[i] = L - pos;
 65 |    }
 66 |}
 67 |*/
 68 |void main() {
 69 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 70 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 71 |  //vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 72 |  //lightStore(eposition);
 73 |  /*
 74 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 75 |    {
 76 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 77 |            continue;
 78 |        vec3 L = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye) -eposition.xyz);
 79 |        fL[i] = L;
 80 |        fH[i] = normalize(L + V);
 81 |    }
 82 |    */
 83 |  fN = eN;
 84 |  fE = eposition.xyz;
 85 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 86 |}
Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_pi*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |
 45 |//in vec4 color;
 46 |
 47 |in vec3 fN;
 48 |//in vec3 fH;
 49 |in vec3 fE;
 50 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 51 |
 52 |//in vec3 pNormal;
 53 |//in vec3 pView;//E
 54 |//in vec3 pPos;
 55 |//in vec3 pL[lights.length()];
 56 |
 57 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 58 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 59 |
 60 |out vec4 fragColor;
 61 |
 62 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 63 |{
 64 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 65 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 66 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 67 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 68 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 72 |{
 73 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 74 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 75 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 76 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 77 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 78 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 82 |{
 83 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |        
 89 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 90 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 91 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 92 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 93 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 94 |        {
 95 |            vec4 color = emissive;
 96 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 97 |                continue;
 98 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 99 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
100 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
101 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
102 |            float F = one_over_pi*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
103 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
104 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
105 |            float CT = F*D*G;
106 |            vec4 diffuse = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse;
107 |            vec4 specular = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular;
108 |            color+=diffuse+specular;
109 |        }
110 |        fragColor=color;
111 |        
112 |        //fragColor=vec4(0.7f);
113 |}

[Tue Apr 21 17:04:27 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(106) : error C1008: undefined variable "speculaSr"

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |//const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |//const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |layout (location = 21) uniform float m;
 45 |layout (location = 22) uniform float lambda;
 46 |
 47 |//in vec4 color;
 48 |
 49 |in vec3 fN;
 50 |//in vec3 fH;
 51 |in vec3 fE;
 52 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 53 |
 54 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 55 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 56 |
 57 |out vec4 fragColor;
 58 |
 59 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 60 |{
 61 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 62 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 63 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 64 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 65 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 69 |{
 70 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 71 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 72 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 73 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 74 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 75 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 76 |}
 77 |
 78 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 79 |{
 80 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main()
 84 |{
 85 |        
 86 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 87 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 88 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 89 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 90 |        vec4 color = emissive;
 91 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 92 |        {
 93 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 94 |                continue;
 95 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 96 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
 97 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
 98 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
 99 |            float F = one_over_pi*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
100 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
101 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
102 |            float CT = F*D*G;
103 |            vec4 diffuseS = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse*diffuse;
104 |            vec4 specularS = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular*specular;
105 |            vec4 ambientS = lights[i].ambient * ambient;
106 |            color+=ambientS+diffuseS+speculaSr;
107 |        }
108 |        fragColor=color;
109 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |//const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |//const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |layout (location = 21) uniform float m;
 45 |layout (location = 22) uniform float lambda;
 46 |
 47 |//in vec4 color;
 48 |
 49 |in vec3 fN;
 50 |//in vec3 fH;
 51 |in vec3 fE;
 52 |//in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 53 |
 54 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 55 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 56 |
 57 |out vec4 fragColor;
 58 |
 59 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 60 |{
 61 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 62 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 63 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 64 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 65 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 69 |{
 70 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 71 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 72 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 73 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 74 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 75 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 76 |}
 77 |
 78 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 79 |{
 80 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main()
 84 |{
 85 |        
 86 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 87 |        vec3 E = normalize (-fE);
 88 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 89 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 90 |        vec4 color = emissive;
 91 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 92 |        {
 93 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 94 |                continue;
 95 |            //L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 96 |            //H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
 97 |            L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-fE);
 98 |            H[i]=normalize(L[i]+E);
 99 |            float F = one_over_pi*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
100 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
101 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
102 |            float CT = F*D*G;
103 |            vec4 diffuseS = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse*diffuse;
104 |            vec4 specularS = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular*specular;
105 |            vec4 ambientS = lights[i].ambient * ambient;
106 |            color+=ambientS+diffuseS+speculaS;
107 |        }
108 |        fragColor=color;
109 |}

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/cook.vert
---------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec3 fN;
 45 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 46 |out vec3 fE;
 47 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 48 |
 49 |void main() {
 50 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 51 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 52 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        L[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-eposition);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            L[i] = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |        H[i]=normalize(L[i]+V);
 64 |    }
 65 |  fN = eN;
 66 |  fE = V;
 67 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 68 |}

  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec3 fN;
 45 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 46 |out vec3 fE;
 47 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 48 |
 49 |void main() {
 50 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 51 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 52 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 53 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 54 |    {
 55 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 56 |            continue;
 57 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 58 |        fL[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-eposition);
 59 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 60 |        {
 61 |            fL[i] = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 62 |        }
 63 |        fH[i]=normalize(L[i]+V);
 64 |    }
 65 |  fN = eN;
 66 |  fE = V;
 67 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 68 |}

[Tue Apr 21 17:31:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/cook.vert
[Tue Apr 21 17:31:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/cook.frag
[Tue Apr 21 17:31:44 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(100) : error C1008: undefined variable "directCheck"

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/cook.frag
-----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |//uniform
 42 |//const float lambda = 0.5f;
 43 |//const float m = 0.5f;
 44 |layout (location = 21) uniform float m;
 45 |layout (location = 22) uniform float lambda;
 46 |
 47 |//in vec4 color;
 48 |
 49 |in vec3 fN;
 50 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 51 |in vec3 fE;
 52 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 53 |
 54 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 55 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 56 |
 57 |out vec4 fragColor;
 58 |
 59 |float Beckmann(vec3 H, vec3 N, float m)
 60 |{
 61 |    float nDotH = max (0.001f, dot(N,H));
 62 |    float nDotH2 = pow(nDotH,2);
 63 |    float nDotH4 = pow(nDotH,4);
 64 |    float tan2a = (nDotH2-1.0f)/nDotH2;
 65 |    return (1.0f/(4*m*m*nDotH4)) * pow(e,tan2a/(m*m));
 66 |}
 67 |
 68 |float Gatten (vec3 L, vec3 E, vec3 H, vec3 N)
 69 |{
 70 |    float nDotH = dot(N,H);
 71 |    float nDotE = dot(N,E);
 72 |    float nDotL = dot(N,L);
 73 |    float hDotE = max (0.001f, dot(H,E));
 74 |    float X = 2.0f*nDotH/hDotE;
 75 |    return min(1.0f, max(0.0f, max(X*nDotE,X*nDotL)));
 76 |}
 77 |
 78 |float Frensel (vec3 E, vec3 N, float lambda)
 79 |{
 80 |    return pow(1.0+dot(E,N),lambda);
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |void main()
 84 |{
 85 |        
 86 |        vec3 N = normalize (fN);
 87 |        vec3 E = normalize (fE);
 88 |        vec3 L[lights.length()];
 89 |        vec3 H[lights.length()];
 90 |        vec4 color = emissive;
 91 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
 92 |        {
 93 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 94 |                continue;
 95 |            L[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
 96 |            H[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
 97 |
 98 |            float d = distance (L[i], E);
 99 |            float aten = 1;
100 |            if (directCheck==0)
101 |            {
102 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
103 |            }
104 |            float foco = 1.0;
105 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
106 |            {
107 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-L[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
108 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
109 |            }
110 |
111 |            float F = one_over_pi*Frensel(E,N,lambda);
112 |            float D = Beckmann (H[i],N,m) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
113 |            float G = Gatten(L[i],E,H[i],N) / max (0.001f, dot(L[i],N));
114 |            float CT = F*D*G;
115 |            vec4 diffuseS = max(0.0f,dot(N,L[i]))*lights[i].diffuse*diffuse;
116 |            vec4 specularS = max(0.0f,CT)*lights[i].specular*specular;
117 |            vec4 ambientS = lights[i].ambient * ambient;
118 |            color+=aten*foco*(ambientS+diffuseS+specularS);
119 |        }
120 |        fragColor=color;
121 |}

Vertex shader: ../ej6-2/ash.vert
--------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |in vec4 position;
 42 |in vec3 normal;
 43 |
 44 |out vec3 fN;
 45 |out vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 46 |out vec3 fE;
 47 |out vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 48 |out vec3 fTang;
 49 |out vec3 fBi;
 50 |
 51 |void main() {
 52 |  vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix * normal);
 53 |  vec3 tangent;
 54 |  vec3 c1 = cross(eN, vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
 55 |  vec3 c2 = cross(eN, vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
 56 |  if( len(c1) > len(c2) )
 57 |  {
 58 |    tangent = normalize(c1);
 59 |  }
 60 |  else
 61 |  {
 62 |    tangent = normalize(c2);
 63 |  }
 64 |  vec3 biNorm = normalize(cross(tangent, eN));
 65 |  vec3 eposition = vec3(modelviewMatrix * position);
 66 |  vec3 V = normalize(-eposition.xyz);
 67 |    for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++) 
 68 |    {
 69 |        if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
 70 |            continue;
 71 |        int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
 72 |        fL[i]=normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye)-eposition);
 73 |        if (directCheck!=0)
 74 |        {
 75 |            fL[i] = normalize(vec3(lights[i].positionEye));
 76 |        }
 77 |        fH[i]=normalize(fL[i]+V);
 78 |    }
 79 |  fN = eN;
 80 |  fBi = biNorm;
 81 |  fTang = tangent;
 82 |  fE = V;
 83 |  gl_Position = modelviewprojMatrix * position;
 84 |}

  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |//in vec4 color;
 47 |
 48 |in vec3 fN;
 49 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fE;
 51 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 52 |in vec3 fTang;
 53 |in vec3 fBi;
 54 |
 55 |const float one_over_pi = 0.313831f;
 56 |const float e = 2.718282f;
 57 |
 58 |out vec4 fragColor;
 59 |
 60 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 61 |{
 62 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 66 |{
 67 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 71 |{
 72 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 73 |}
 74 |
 75 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 76 |{
 77 |    vec3 = light;
 78 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 79 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 80 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 81 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 82 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 83 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 84 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 85 |
 86 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotVU*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 87 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 88 |
 89 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 90 |}
 91 |
 92 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 93 |{
 94 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 95 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 96 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 97 |    return scale*v*l;
 98 |}
 99 |
100 |void main()
101 |{
102 |        
103 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
104 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
105 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
106 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
107 |        vec3 k1[lights.length()];
108 |        vec3 h[lights.length()];
109 |
110 |        vec4 color = emissive;
111 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
112 |        {
113 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
114 |                continue;
115 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
116 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
117 |
118 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
119 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
120 |            float aten = 1;
121 |            if (directCheck==0)
122 |            {
123 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
124 |            }
125 |            float foco = 1.0;
126 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
127 |            {
128 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
129 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
130 |            }
131 |
132 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
133 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
134 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
135 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
136 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
137 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
138 |
139 |            color += aten*foco*(
140 |            Ma * Ra
141 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
142 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
143 |        }
144 |        fragColor=color;
145 |}

 73 |}

 75 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 76 |{
 77 |    vec3 = light;
 78 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 79 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 80 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 81 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 82 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 83 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 84 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 85 |
 86 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotVU*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 87 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 88 |
 89 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 90 |}
 91 |
 92 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 93 |{
 94 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 95 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 96 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 97 |    return scale*v*l;
 98 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |/*
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |*/
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotVU*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        //vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        //vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        /*
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        */
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |/*
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotVU*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |*/
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        //vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        //vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        /*
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        */
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotVU*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        //vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        //vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        /*
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        */
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotV*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        //vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        //vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        /*
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        */
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

[Tue Apr 21 18:55:54 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(111) : error C1008: undefined variable "k1"
0(112) : error C1008: undefined variable "h"
0(115) : error C1008: undefined variable "k1"
0(124) : error C1008: undefined variable "k1"
