Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 k = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotV*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        //vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        //vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag

  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 k = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotV*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * Rs * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * Rd * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

[Tue Apr 21 18:59:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/ash.vert
[Tue Apr 21 18:59:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/ash.frag
[Tue Apr 21 18:59:07 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(137) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #4 ("h.8")
0(137) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #5 ("light.9")
0(138) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #2 ("light.25")

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 k = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotV*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |            
135 |            color += aten*foco*(
136 |            Ma * Ra
137 |            + Ms * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)
138 |            + Md * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
139 |        }
140 |        
141 |        fragColor=color;
142 |}

[Tue Apr 21 19:02:00 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../ej6-2/ash.frag
[Tue Apr 21 19:02:00 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(135) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #4 ("h.8")
0(135) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #5 ("light.9")
0(135) : error C1102: incompatible type for parameter #2 ("light.25")

Fragment shader: ../ej6-2/ash.frag
----------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |struct LightSource {
 12 |  vec4 ambient, diffuse, specular;
 13 |  vec4 positionWorld;
 14 |  vec4 positionEye;
 15 |  vec3 spotDirectionWorld;
 16 |  int directional;
 17 |  vec3 spotDirectionEye;
 18 |  int enabled;
 19 |  float spotExponent, spotCutoff, spotCosCutoff;
 20 |  vec3 attenuation;
 21 |};
 22 |layout (std140, binding=2) uniform Lights {
 23 |  LightSource lights[4];
 24 |};
 25 |layout (std140, binding=1) uniform Material {
 26 |vec4 diffuse;
 27 |vec4 ambient;
 28 |vec4 specular;
 29 |vec4 emissive;
 30 |float shininess;
 31 |int textureCount;
 32 |};
 33 |
 34 |uint numDiffTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 0, 3); }
 35 |uint numSpecTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 3, 3); }
 36 |uint numNormTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 6, 3); }
 37 |uint numHeightTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 9, 3); }
 38 |uint numOpacTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 12, 3); }
 39 |uint numAmbTextures() { return bitfieldExtract(textureCount, 15, 3); }
 40 |
 41 |layout (location = 25) uniform float nu;
 42 |layout (location = 26) uniform float nv;
 43 |layout (location = 27) uniform float spec_coeff;
 44 |layout (location = 28) uniform float diff_coeff;
 45 |
 46 |in vec3 fN;
 47 |in vec3 fH[lights.length()];
 48 |in vec3 fE;
 49 |in vec3 fL[lights.length()];
 50 |in vec3 fTang;
 51 |in vec3 fBi;
 52 |
 53 |out vec4 fragColor;
 54 |
 55 |vec4 pow5(vec4 f)
 56 |{
 57 |    return f*f*f*f*f;
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |vec4 Frensel(vec4 refl, vec4 kh)
 61 |{
 62 |    return refl+(vec4(1.0f)-refl)*pow5(vec4(1.0f)-kh);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |vec4 mclamp(vec4 v)
 66 |{
 67 |    return max(v, vec4(0.01f));
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |vec4 ash_specular(float nu, float nv, vec3 n, vec3 h, vec3 light, vec3 eye, vec3 u, vec3 v, vec4 spec)
 71 |{
 72 |    vec3 k = light;
 73 |    vec4 nDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 74 |    vec4 nDotK = mclamp(vec4(dot(k,n)));
 75 |    vec4 nDotL = mclamp(vec4(dot(light,n)));
 76 |    vec4 nDotE = mclamp(vec4(dot(eye,n)));
 77 |    vec4 kDotH = mclamp(vec4(dot(h,n)));
 78 |    vec4 hDotU = vec4(dot(h,u));
 79 |    vec4 hDotV = vec4(dot(h,v));
 80 |
 81 |    vec4 exponent = (vec4(nu)*hDotU*hDotU + vec4(nv)*hDotV*hDotV) / (vec4(1.0f) - nDotH*nDotH);
 82 |    vec4 Gatten = pow (nDotH, exponent) / (nDotK*max(nDotL,nDotE));
 83 |
 84 |    return Gatten*Frensel(spec, kDotH);
 85 |}
 86 |
 87 |vec4 ash_diffuse(vec3 normal, vec3 light, vec3 viewer, vec4 spec, vec4 diffuse)
 88 |{
 89 |    vec4 scale = diffuse*(vec4(1.0f)-spec);
 90 |    vec4 v = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,light),0.0f)/2.0f));
 91 |    vec4 l = vec4(1.0f) - pow5(vec4(1.0f-max(dot(normal,viewer),0.0f)/2.0f));
 92 |    return scale*v*l;
 93 |}
 94 |
 95 |void main()
 96 |{
 97 |        
 98 |        vec3 n = normalize (fN);
 99 |        vec3 u = normalize (fTang);
100 |        vec3 v = normalize (fBi);
101 |        vec3 k2 = normalize (fE);
102 |        vec3 k1[lights.length()];
103 |        vec3 h[lights.length()];
104 |
105 |        vec4 color = emissive;
106 |        
107 |        for (int i = 0; i < lights.length(); i++)
108 |        {
109 |            if (lights[i].enabled == 0)
110 |                continue;
111 |            k1[i]=normalize(fL[i]);
112 |            h[i]=normalize(fH[i]);
113 |
114 |            int directCheck = lights[i].directional;
115 |            float d = distance (k1[i], k2);
116 |            float aten = 1;
117 |            if (directCheck==0)
118 |            {
119 |                aten = 1 / max ( 1, lights[i].attenuation[0] + lights[i].attenuation[1] * d + lights[i].attenuation[2] * pow(d,2) );
120 |            }
121 |            float foco = 1.0;
122 |            if (lights[i].directional==0 && lights[i].spotCutoff < 180.0)
123 |            {
124 |                float maxCosAngle = max(dot(-k1[i], lights[i].spotDirectionEye), 0.0);
125 |                foco = maxCosAngle >= lights[i].spotCosCutoff ? foco = pow(maxCosAngle,lights[i].spotExponent) : 0.0;
126 |            }
127 |
128 |            vec4 Rs = lights[i].specular;
129 |            vec4 Rd = lights[i].diffuse;
130 |            vec4 Ra = lights[i].ambient;
131 |            vec4 Ms = specular;
132 |            vec4 Md = diffuse;
133 |            vec4 Ma = ambient;
134 |            
135 |            color += aten*foco*(Ma * Ra + Ms * spec_coeff * ash_specular(nu, nv, n, h, k1, k2, u, v, Rs)+ Md * diff_coeff * ash_diffuse(n, k1, k2, Rs, Rd));
136 |        }
137 |        
138 |        fragColor=color;
139 |}
